name: Julie Waggoner
text: I'd give it 0 stars if possible. Manager was unbelievably rude. Got there 20 minutes before they closed only to find the doors locked. Walked around to the side to find the 4 employees out smoking. Asked if they were open. Manager blows …More

name: Dan Pho
text: Walked in at 8:10 and said they weren’t serving pizza and they closed at 9:00pm. I agree with comments on here. Absolutely horrible service. Casey pizza down the road in Williamsburg to let y’all know and they will make your pizza even when it’s close to closing. 5 star for them.

name: Bonnie Castillo
text: While staying at the water park next door, ordered pizza to go.  Was greeted by friendly staff, pizza was quick, hot and good.   Order was completed as ordered.

name: Alisha Knight
text: ********WARNING!********Absolutely ridiculous!!! Bar tender at Waserbahn said "good thing you ordered early they like to run out of pizza every Saturday night, they like to get off early." Well, he wasn't fibbing!!! DONOT order from here. …More

name: Steven Thompson
text: terrible service and non functional staff...outright rude service. been here 2 times and both times was told they are out of pizzas and cannot serve us...don't waste your time to even go here....
